short_summary: Various specialized marine training, like watchkeeping mate certification and cargo certification for  Search and Rescue Coordinators
description: Various specialized marine training, including (but not limited to) Watchkeeping Mate certification, Near Costal, Ship Construction, and Stability (various level), and Cargo (various level) for its current employees in order to promote them as Search and Rescue (SAR) Coordinator in Central Region is required. The fibre aim is to provide the employees with the proper training and certification and to meet the staffing levels of the Central region
